Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Achaekek]{Achaekek}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ahriman]{Ahriman}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Barzahk]{Barzahk}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Charon]{Charon}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Dammerich]{Dammerich}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Hanspur]{Hanspur}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Imot]{Imot}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Magrim]{Magrim}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Mother Vulture]{Mother Vulture}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Naderi]{Naderi}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Narakaas]{Narakaas}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Norgorber]{Norgorber}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Pharasma]{Pharasma}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Saloc]{Saloc}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Shax]{Shax}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Yaezhing]{Yaezhing}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Zyphus]{Zyphus}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Death's Call]{Death's Call}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Eradicate Undeath]{Eradicate Undeath}

You have the power to end lives and destroy undead.
name: Death Domain
